-- Anachronox / Pacifix --

Anachronox smirks as Pacifix leaves.

Pacifix follows Tankor to the exit, nods to him, then walks 
outside. "Pacifix transform." He folds into vehicle mode, and heads 
away from the Shadow Destiny.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Daemos: Farewell then. Remember that you have my support in any 
> operation that you will undertake. 
> 
> Tankor: Follow me, sir.
> 
> He takes him outside.
> 
> Tankor: The shields are lowered. You can leave whenever you are 
ready.
>
